name: polyanthus

a small garden plant with several brightly coloured flowers growing together: Most gardeners in this part of the world have polyanthus in their garden. Polyanthuses grown in pots should be top-dressed with compost in the early part of this month.
(also polyanthus narcissus plural polyanthus narcissi) a kind of narcissus (= a flowering plant) that produces small yellow or white flowers: The flowers of the polyanthus have a strong, sweet fragrance. I grow polyanthus narcissi in pots, supported by small stones. Synonym
paperwhite
